plot: Filipino American artists describe how hip hop culture gives a fitting expression to their culture, history, and politics.
title: Hip Hop Mestizaje: Racialization, Resonance and Filipino American Knowledge of Self
plot_es: Filipino American artists describe how hip hop culture gives a fitting expression to their culture, history, and politics.
original_name: Hip Hop Mestizaje: Racialization, Resonance and Filipino American Knowledge of Self
plot_en: Filipino American artists describe how hip hop culture gives a fitting expression to their culture, history, and politics.
